attributes.action: Insist Southern rail are to declassify First Class seats/areas immediately
attributes.additional_details:
Every morning and afternoon thousands of people are crammed & crushed into trains that don't run on time and to add insult we are liable to have to pay more money for southerns incompetence.

I experienced first hand this morning after being crammed into a carriage, Whilst STANDING in first class that I had to pay a fare to use first class, This is not only Riciculous but also a Health & Safety violation and also Clearly a way to take more money from hard working Londoners.

We need your help!
attributes.background: For the past 2 years atleast , Londoners & Brits far and wide have been affected by Southern Rail FAILING London, Not only do we endure strike action, delays & through the nose Fares. We are now being forced to only certain parts of the train & can be fined furter expense for sitting in first class.

rejection.details: Train passenger classifications are a commercial decision for Govia Southern Rail, not a decision for the Government.
